articles.title: Repeat offender? Woman who refused to wear mask in MBS has pending charge over similar offence - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - The woman seen in a viral clip refusing to don a mask while at Marina Bay Sands (MBS) last Saturday (May 15) is already facing a criminal charge over a similar offence allegedly committed in the same month last year. According to court documents T…

articles.title: Zimbabwe reports first cases of coronavirus variant from India - News24
articles.description: Zimbabwe has detected the first cases of the new coronavirus variant that emerged in India, Vice President Constantino Chiwenga said, adding that all travellers from the Asian nation would be required to undergo mandatory quarantine.

articles.description: This comes even as the number of new cases in its devastating new wave fell.. Read more at straitstimes.com.

NEW DELHI (AFP) - India on Wednesday (May 19) reported a record 4,529 coronavirus deaths in a single day even as the number of new cases in its devastating new wave fell.
